short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: V-MEET Video Conference that allows you to schedule E-Meetings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that allows you to schedule V-Meetings and stream your desktop into V-MEET conferences.
V-Meet is an OpenSource (Apache) WebRTC JavaScript application that uses Jitsi Videobridge to provide high quality, scalable video conferences. 

You can try it out yourself at https://emeeting.vivagroup.co.id

This extension provides the emeeting.vivagroup.co.id site with desktop streaming functionality over Chrome.
